item.description:
Ease your mind
Calm your body
Increase your creativity
And sense of well being...

The benefits of relaxation may include improved health, well being and overall happiness. Use this opportunity to practice most common relaxation exercises in a warm, supportive group atmosphere.

This weeks topic: Thinking and perception

This session will focus on ways in which our thinking and perception affects the amount of stress we experience. We will talk about practices you can use in your every day life to deal with maladaptive thought patterns. We will also practice observing our thoughts during a meditation exercise.
item.name: Stress Reduction and Relaxation: Thinking and Perception
